OMG Dave that is amazing. For me its very clear and only a slight difference in perception 
   
  Thank you for testing with us today
  They have been testing. This is possible.
   
  I kind of hear the impossible now and then but overall I tune to the + side. Yep you and Frank are definitely on to something 
   
  Misty

RetroCom <vfp19968@...> wrote:

Response: "Ben testing..This is impossible"

Dave
